description: Kéo lại voucher không giá ở bảng BK bị hết hiệu lực -> gia hạn
body:
SELECT
    C.Value
INTO
    #tmpActiveGroupCode
FROM
    dbo.CTKM_Condition C (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.CTKM_structure S (NOLOCK)
			ON C.DocEntry_structure = S.DocEntry
				AND C.Object = 3
				AND C.Properties = 2
				AND GETDATE() BETWEEN S.ActiveDate AND S.InActiveDate;

INSERT INTO dbo.FPT_PROMS
    (
         DocEntry_SO
       , Status
       , Email
       , CreateDate
       , GroupCode
       , Phone
       , updatedate
       , Email2
       , Status_push_mpos
       , U_Desc
       , Remark
       , type
    )
SELECT
      DocEntry_SO
    , Status
    , Email
    , CreateDate
    , GroupCode
    , Phone
    , updatedate
    , Email2
    , Status_push_mpos
    , U_Desc
    , Remark
    , type
FROM
	#tmpActiveGroupCode T
		INNER JOIN dbo.FPT_PROMS_BK_ARCHIVE B (NOLOCK)
			ON T.Value = B.GroupCode
WHERE
    Status = 6
	AND B.GroupCode > 1000
